/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the street below. The street is teeming with cars and buses, indicating a busy time of day. The buildings lining the street are tall and modern, their glass windows reflecting the bright sunlight. The sky above is a clear blue, and the sun shines brightly, illuminating the scene with a warm glow.
